text: I nourish myself by means of rustic simplicity, and dare to take joy in vacuous non-being.

A seemingly bottomless flask of specially fermented and spiced yeast wine, brewed for use in ancient Taoist rituals and ceremonies. Sipping from the gourd in moderation is said to be able to help one open their minds and concentrate on the universe, whilst consuming in excess can grant powers and truths beyond a mortal's capabilities and masteries.
Astonishing magicians, swifter than one's eye, change their appearance, sunder their own bodies into multiples, swallow knives and exhale fire.
Parrot on the advice of this trusty wingman, or you'll surely be in a flap! Don't forget to give him a cracker.
